Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A. Senor
Reviews.Content: The product arrived as expected.  it works great and was fairly easy to set up.  I will purchase from you again.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: loved this bullet camera
Reviews.Author: elmer
Reviews.Content: it came with every thing, like the power supply, 100 ft. cable, and bnc ends. and it has a good price. some cameras you you buy that's all you get is  just a camera no power supply or cable or ends.  thank you  elmer

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in Color DSP Sony CCD NTSC; 480 TV Lines
Small size, discreet installation; Weatherproof housing
Built-in f 3.6mm Lens; Swivel mount included
Digital automatic backlight compensation
Package including: 1 x bullet camera, 1 x 12V DC 500mA power supply, 1 x High Sensitive Preamp Mini Microphone and 1 x audio video power extension cable
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Outdoor Built-in Sony CCD Bullet Security Camera Weatherproof 3.6mm Wide View Angle Lens for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance System with Free Power Supply, Microphone and Extension Cable CFB
